indicatorTemplateXML.author: Colcamex Resources Inc. for Oscar EMR

heading.name: Pneumococcal Immunization
heading.definition: % of patients aged 65 and older who have a record of receiving a pneumococcal vaccine
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from HQO's PCPM: Priority Measures for System and Practice Levels (Oct 2015

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.pneu) ,0 ) AS "% Has Pneumococcal Vaccine",
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.patient) - COUNT(fin.pneu) ,0 ) AS "% No Pneumococcal Vaccine"
FROM (
SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, PNEU.id as pneu FROM demographic d
-- LOOK FOR pneumococcal VACCINES LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${prevention} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 AND p.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.demographic_no) > -1 ) PNEU ON (d.demographic_no = PNEU.demographic_no )
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) ) fin

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d
-- LOOK FOR pneumococcal VACCINES LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, MAX(p.prevention_date) AS prevention_date, p.refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${prevention} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.demographic_no) > -1 ) PNEU ON (d.demographic_no = PNEU.demographic_no )
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} )
